column4: Oh yea. if using suspend/hibernate you will want a bigger swap..
Ive had no real issues with 8.10 so far.. other then its not wanting to automount my usb thumbdrive
with the 8.10 beta, my wireless worked, with the 8.10 release it doesn't work.. hence beta= better then release
wireless onboth my laptops finally worked with just a few clicks for me under 8.10 - so to each their own.. :)
